Scrapper - Anytime you successfully defend against a Body-damaging attack you can choose to make a Chance roll. On a 2+, your attacker suffers 2 Body damage.
Enhanced Senses - +2D on perception checks to spot hidden, invisible, or obscured characters, team gains +1 Re-roll on initiative checks.
Iron Will - You can resist the effects of mental powers better than most! Gain +1D to your defense checks against any Psyche based mental attack. Also gain +1D on all KO checks.
